text: @ScramPratchett He stood there for a moment, but immediately corrected himself.

passages.fragment: He stood there for a moment ,
passages.full_quote: <used>He stood there for a moment, t</used>hen with an imperative gesture he waved me aside, and once more, on hands and knees, he continued his search of the floor of the shed
Renauld looked at him <used>for a moment, but</used> the magistrate was continuing his questions

passages.fragment: a moment , but immediately corrected himself
passages.full_quote: He pondered <used>a moment, but immediately corrected himself</used>
